input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='6 ft. White Unlit Flocked PVC Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Stand'
  - Name='Northlight 4' Canadian Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.'
  - Name='Northlight 2' x 14" Mixed Classic Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='HOMCOM 9' Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and 1014 Tips'
  - Name='Northlight 4.5' x 37" Buffalo Fir Full Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 4' Medium Mixed Green Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Unlit Pencil Christmas Tree Spruce Style Holiday Decor w Branch Tips'
  - Name='Northlight 28" Balsam Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.'
  - Name='National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree 7.5''

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. White Unlit Flocked PVC Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size (6 ft) and includes metal stand; however, it is flocked white PVC and unlit, differing in color, material, and lighting feature from the green pre-lit Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4' Canadian Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller height (4 ft) and unlit Canadian Pine; similar purpose but less full body and no lighting or hinged branches reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same model, larger size (9 ft vs. 6 ft), likely same construction and features; very highly relevant but different height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same model, larger size (9 ft vs. 6 ft), likely same construction and features; very highly relevant but different height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 2' x 14" Mixed Classic Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size and different pine variety; less relevant due to scale and presumed structure differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HOMCOM 9' Unlit Snow-Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches and 1014 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar large size and many branch tips, but unlit, flocked (snow-covered), and slim silhouette make it moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4.5' x 37" Buffalo Fir Full Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir type and full-bodied style, though smaller and unlit; shares key features making it fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4' Medium Mixed Green Pine Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller height and unlit mixed pine; somewhat relevant but lacks pre-lit and full size features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Unlit Pencil Christmas Tree Spruce Style Holiday Decor w Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different shape (pencil slim), unlit, and spruce style rather than fir; not closely matching reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 28" Balsam Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size (28") and different pine variety; much less relevant to the full 6ft Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate product entry, same as before; very relevant with larger size but same features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate product entry, same as before; very relevant with larger size but same features.
